The wound will heal in 6 weeks. Do not h: Leqeba le tla fola diveke tse 6. Se etse thabalano ka 6 diveke leqeba le se tshwaetswe kapa ho thonkgelwa. Qoba ho tsuba, tahi le dithethefatsi. Boloka molamu o peraletse ka 7-10 matsatsi, ho ruruha ho fele. Apara diaparo hlwekile ka hare kamehla. Marikgwana eseng a malelele. Se tswenyehe ka madi maseleng. Madi maseleng leba tleliniking kapele.  Brothers for Life
You have finished your set of SMSs and y: O qetile sete ya hao ya diSMS tsa lebollo mme qeba la hao le fodile.Ha ho se jwalo,thusa o etele tleleniki ya hao ya lehae.Diteboho ka ho sebedisa tsebo ya MMC.
